black_ash_teleport.name: Black Ash Teleport
black_ash_teleport.flavor: In a swirl of black ash, you step from one place to another.
black_ash_teleport.effect: You teleport up to 5 squares. If you end this movement in concealment or cover, you can use the Hide maneuver even if you are observed.
black_ash_teleport.other: Spend Insight: You teleport 1 additional square for each insight spent.

in_all_this_confusion.name: In All This Confusion
in_all_this_confusion.flavor: You teleport away in a plume of black smoke to avoid danger.
in_all_this_confusion.effect: You teleport up to 4 squares, halve the triggering damage, and don't suffer any effect associated with the damage.
in_all_this_confusion.other: Spend Insight: You teleport 1 additional square for each insight spent.
